mapper.select: SELECT l.log_id AS logId, l.log_session_id AS logSessionId, u.login_id AS loginId, l.log_type AS logType, l.log_initial_question AS logInitialQuestion, l.log_predicted_intent AS logPredictedIntent, l.log_confidence_score AS logConfidenceScore, l.log_created_at AS logCreatedAt FROM chatbot_logs l LEFT JOIN users u ON l.user_id = u.user_id WHERE l.log_type = #{type}::chatbot_log_type_enum ORDER BY l.log_created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT l.log_id AS logId, u.login_id AS loginId, l.log_initial_question AS initialMessage, l.log_predicted_intent AS finalIntent, l.log_confidence_score AS confidence FROM chatbot_logs l LEFT JOIN users u ON l.user_id = u.user_id WHERE l.log_id = #{logId}
SELECT message_sender AS sender, message_text AS text, message_timestamp AS timestamp FROM chatbot_message_logs WHERE log_id = #{logId} ORDER BY message_order_index ASC
